Class InMemoryInternshipRepository

Object
InMemoryInternshipRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
InternshipRepository
public class InMemoryInternshipRepository extends Object implements InternshipRepository
in-memory implementation of InternshipRepository stores internship records using a hash map keyed by internship id data is volatile and cleared when application terminates

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Map<String, Internship>
    internships
    map storing internship records keyed by internship id

    • filter

      public List<Internship> filter(InternshipFilter filter)
      filter internships using multiple optional conditions from InternshipFilter filtering supports status, major, level, company, representative id, slot range, and date range logic any null criteria is ignored
      Specified by:
      filter in interface InternshipRepository
      Parameters:
      filter - configured InternshipFilter object containing filter criteria
      Returns:
      list of internships satisfying all provided filter criteria
